response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value and can greatly benefit you. I understand that value perception varies from person to person, so if $150 is too high, please let me know your preferred price range and we can discuss a mutually beneficial arrangement. Don't hesitate to ask any questions about the product or its features. Looking forward to your response!", "product_price": 150}
